channel.title: Rune-Revolution
channel.description:
[size=24pt]Well this is sagi. but i Edited Alot And i Made so many new stuff. witch i managed to get over 60$ donations On first mothe with 40 players online. [/size] [CENTER] [b]Base: Project Insanity[/b]
[b]Features:[/b] -Working Easter ring, Ring of stone & NEW Glarial's Amulet tweak ;) -All dupes fixed. Some fixed dupes include: Arrow/bolt dupe, trade/bank/duel X-log dupe, Cheat Engine Dupe, Any other dupe? = FIXED :) -New Custom Minigame, leveling skills earn you points that can be used to buy items at shop -God Wars 3/4 bosses -Chaotic Rapier / Longsword / Maul with approximately correct stance and fighting style ADDED -All 6 Spirit Shields ADDED -Full Dragon Helmet ADDED -Berserker, Warrior, Archer, Seers Ring [b](i)[/b] ADDED ( the new imbued one ;) ) -Rocktail Food ADDED -Vengeance working !!! -Fully Working Enchanted Gem in shop -All Artefacts ADDED, you can activate them to retrieve cash :) -New HP Bars -New Helpful Quest tab interface -Many more things....im so tired to remember them :P
[NOTE: DROP RATE IS A BIT HIGH, BETTER LOWER IT ;)]
Now some pictures:
[b]Home (EDGEVILLE, sorry if you're tired of this home, hehe) [/b] [IMG]http://i1213.photobucket.com/albums/cc465/sagi2/MY%20FIRST%20RELEASE/Home.png[/img]
[b]WORKING EASTER RING / RING OF STONE / GLARIAL'S (H'WEEN) AMULET[/b] [IMG]http://i1213.photobucket.com/albums/cc465/sagi2/MY%20FIRST%20RELEASE/easterring100.jpg[/img][IMG]http://i1213.photobucket.com/albums/cc465/sagi2/MY%20FIRST%20RELEASE/ringofstone.png[/img][IMG]http://i1213.photobucket.com/albums/cc465/sagi2/MY%20FIRST%20RELEASE/glarialsamulet.png[/img][IMG]http://i1213.photobucket.com/albums/cc465/sagi2/MY%20FIRST%20RELEASE/ringsworking.png[/img]
[b]CHAOTIC RAPIER AND MAUL STANCE AND ITEMS ADDED These are 5 second videos watch these two ;)[/b]: [URL=http://tinypic.com/r/2uh91nb/7]Chaotic Rapier[/URL] [URL=http://tinypic.com/r/ifafc6/7]Chaotic Maul[/URL]
[b]NEW ITEMS ADDED:[/b] [IMG]http://i1213.photobucket.com/albums/cc465/sagi2/MY%20FIRST%20RELEASE/newcoolitems1.jpg[/img]
[b]ALL NEW ARTEFACTS, activate them to claim money:[/b] [IMG]http://i1213.photobucket.com/albums/cc465/sagi2/MY%20FIRST%20RELEASE/artefactsw00t.png[/img]
[b]NEW QUEST TAB FOR USEFUL STUFF:[/b] [IMG]http://i1213.photobucket.com/albums/cc465/sagi2/MY%20FIRST%20RELEASE/newquesttabinterface.png[/img]
[b]NEW HP BARS[/b] [IMG]http://i1213.photobucket.com/albums/cc465/sagi2/MY%20FIRST%20RELEASE/newhpbars.png[/img]
[b]COSTUME SHOP[/b] [IMG]http://i1213.photobucket.com/albums/cc465/sagi2/MY%20FIRST%20RELEASE/Costumesshop.png[/img]
[b]RZP MINIGAME, level up skills to receive points to buy from the RZP exchange shop :)[/b] [IMG]http://i1213.photobucket.com/albums/cc465/sagi2/MY%20FIRST%20RELEASE/RZPMinigame.png[/img]
NO MORE PICS IM TIRED ATM :P
[b]DOWNLOAD LINK:[/b] Client: http://www.filesonic.com/file/42452457 Source: http://www.filesonic.com/file/42451419
[b][b]DOWNLOADS TILL NOW[/b] (last updated:November 21, 2010, 09:50:25 AM) [s]100 200 300 400 500 600 700 800 900 1000 2000[/s] 5000[/b]
[b]CREDITS:[/b] Sagi (Me) [b]+80%[/b] - updating server with loads thing Exion [b]+80%[/b] - his base that I used Moparscape helpers [b]+10%[/b] za09za05 [b]-70%[/b] - spamming my thread asking for fake credits
[b]It equals 170% - 70% = 100%, so happy with your credits [b]noob za09za05[/b][/b]
[b]INFORMATION[/b] 1. I managed 280 people registered and 40+ playing together the server in the first month, so hope you make that too... ;) 2. This is my first source and i request you to give positive comments as it comprises of all my work. 3. I don't want more downloads and few comments. I want comment on how can I improve it, is it good, etc or i'll remove it if its not appreciated. 4. Leech if you wanna, i don't really care but call me to your server if you get many people ;) [/CENTER]

[CENTER] Base: Project Insanity

-Working Easter ring, Ring of stone & NEW Glarial’s Amulet tweak
-All dupes fixed. Some fixed dupes include: Arrow/bolt dupe, trade/bank/duel X-log dupe, Cheat Engine Dupe, Any other dupe? = FIXED
